Title: Shami to Gaikwad
Commentary: full on off stump, a hint of away shape, good stride forward for a crisp push-drive to mid-off

Title: Shami to Gaikwad
Commentary: length ball close to off stump, defended into the covers

Title: Shami to Gaikwad
Commentary: lovely shot to get CSK off the mark. Length ball again, a bit more width on this occasion, and Gaikwad presses forward before opening his bat face to ease the ball between point and backward point

Title: Shami to Gaikwad
Commentary: fullish, angling into the pads, and there's some late movement away, off the pitch, as Gaikwad attempts the flick. Leading edge flies in the air and bounces down to the right of deep backward point

Title: Shami to Gaikwad
Commentary: length ball outside off, presses forward and punches firmly to short extra-cover

Title: Shami to Gaikwad
Commentary: shot! That's not particularly short, and it only gets up to about thigh height, but Gaikwad swivels quickly on his back foot and pulls it along the floor, placing it a long way to the left of long leg

Title: Hardik to Conway
Commentary: length ball angling across to finish close to off stump, gets forward and pushes to the left of point, who moves quickly to cut off the single

Title: Hardik to Conway
Commentary: first six of the innings, and it's a top shot from Conway. Steps out, steps away to the leg side to create room, and slices this ball, with the angle, over cover point and all the way for six

Title: Hardik to Conway
Commentary: steps out again and Hardik shortens his length while following Conway's movement to the leg side. Defended into the mid-off region

Title: Hardik to Gaikwad
Commentary: back of a length, nips back in towards off stump. Looks to dab into the point region with an open face, gets a thick inside edge into the backward square leg region

Title: Hardik to Conway
Commentary: back of a length slower ball, ends up down the leg side. Conway looks to swat it away off his hip and fails to connect

Title: Hardik to Conway
Commentary: delivers one on the pads now, and Conway just whips it away fine, too file for long leg to be able to cut it off. Just the kind of over CSK needed to get themselves going

Title: Hardik to Conway
Commentary: shuffles out to this length ball finishing near the top of off stump. Opens his bat face to dab to the right of backward point for a quick single

Title: Shami to Conway
Commentary: shot. Back of a length ball angling in to finish around fourth stump, and Conway presses forwarfd and swats it between mid-on and midwicket

Title: Shami to Conway
Commentary: four more. Superb wristwork on this occasion. Uses the round-the-wicket angle expertly, meets this length ball on an off-stumpish line and whips it behind square, in the air, beats deep backward square leg sprinting to his left

Title: Shami to Conway
Commentary: steps out, steps leg-side, and gets leg-side of a leg-stump ball to slice it to the right of deep backward point

Title: Shami to Gaikwad
Commentary: past the edge! Back of a length in the corridor, and it nips away with extra bounce as Gaikwad looks to jab it away square without moving his feet

Title: Shami to Gaikwad
Commentary: length ball straightening towards the top of off stump. Stays leg side of the ball and manufactures a soft-hands single into the off side

Title: Shami to Conway
Commentary: length ball on the pads, clipped to deep backward square leg

Title: Rashid Khan to Conway
Commentary: shot! Makes room to a slightly short-of-length ball straightening towards off stump, and punches it brilliantly to find the gap to the left of backward point

Title: Rashid Khan to Conway
Commentary: senses that he'll try and make room again and fires a quick legbreak at the pads. Misses the flick, and gets a leg bye into the off side. Lbw appeal is quickly aborted because it pitched outside leg, hit the pad outside leg, and was missing leg stump on a second set of imaginary stumps

Title: Rashid Khan to Gaikwad
Commentary: steps out to a ball turning from leg to middle and pushes inside-out towards cover

Title: Rashid Khan to Conway
Commentary: premeditates a sweep to a ball that's too short for the stroke, and he's beaten and smacked in the chest for his troubles. Picks up a leg bye, though

Title: Rashid Khan to Gaikwad
Commentary: bam. CSK are getting off to a great start here. Wrong'un from Rashid, on the fuller side, and he gets his front leg out of the way to manufacture room and launch it sweetly over mid-off

Title: Rashid Khan to Gaikwad
Commentary: just a touch short, legbreak turning away from off stump, and Gaikwad makes room for the square-cut and beats backward point diving to his right

Title: Noor Ahmad to Conway
Commentary: back of a length wide of off stump, reaches out and stabs to the right of deep backward point

Title: Noor Ahmad to Conway
Commentary: looks to make room and the wrong'un follows him, keeps a bit low too. Punched back to the bowler off the back foot

Title: Noor Ahmad to Conway
Commentary: full outside off, too full to get underneath. Driven down to long-off, all along the ground

Title: Noor Ahmad to Gaikwad
Commentary: back of a length, straightens towards the top of off. Makes room and punches to the off-side sweeper

Title: Noor Ahmad to Conway
Commentary: shortish wrong'un, turns down the leg side, beats the attempted pull

Title: Noor Ahmad to Conway
Commentary: wrong'un, I think? Looped up wide outside off, and Conway snatches too eagerly at the cover drive. Ends up dragging it back to the bowler off the inside half of the bat

Title: Noor Ahmad to Conway
Commentary: shortish wrong'un finishing on the pads. Swipes it to the right of short fine leg, where Josh Little makes a good diving stop

Title: Little to Conway
Commentary: short on off stump, Conway pulls and hits it in the air, but doesn't middle it and the ball lands safely in front of deep midwicket, where Rashid runs in from the boundary and to his right and overruns the nball a little

Title: Little to Conway
Commentary: another short ball, gets up a little higher outside off, and Conway pulls into the gap to the right of Rashid at deep midwicket. He overruns the ball again, but turns around quickly and fields it casually with his left hand

Title: Little to Conway
Commentary: back of a length close to off stump, punched to extra-cover. Seemed to stop on him slightly

Title: Little to Gaikwad
Commentary: back of a length, angling across to off stump, clears the front leg and pulls along the ground to deep midwicket

Title: Little to Conway
Commentary: slower ball, fullish on off stump, makes a bit of room and drives to the right of Miller at extra-cover. Moves quickly to the ball and throws at the keeper's end, with no one backing up, and concedes an overthrow

Title: Little to Conway
Commentary: shot! First post-powerplay boundary and it's a six. Not a genuine half-tracker, but it sits up nicely outside off for Conway to pull with conviction and clear the midwicket boundary
